<@UCSKU31SA> I think the forums need some mobile style love as on my phone, it's really hard to use when looking at questions. Everything is good up until you choose a subtopic from the main topics. 

Example 1: the question cards extend beyond screen requiring horizontal scrolling.
Example 2: the question itself is viewable easily, but the answers are beyond the edges with no ability to horizontal scroll
I always request the desktop site when on mobile
